an6.16:2.5: sakkhissati → na sakkhissati (sya-all, km); sakkoti (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | santharitun’ti → saṇṭharitunti (sya-all); santharitunti (pts-vp-pli1ed); sandharitunti (mr)
an6.16:3.4: yaṃ no → yadā no (bj); yadā te (si); yathā (sya-all); yathā no (pts-vp-pli1ed) | samāciṇṇaṃ → samādinnaṃ (bj)
an6.16:6.2: nakulamātā gahapatānī lābhinī → nakulamātā gahapatānī na lābhinī (pts-vp-pli1ed)
